body_html: I would suggest uninstalling protobuf and installing the protobuf version you want to make Caffe work. I would then suggest installing TensorFlow in a virtualenv, so that you don't have to worry about having incompatible copies of protobuf in your system libraries.
body_text: I would suggest uninstalling protobuf and installing the protobuf version you want to make Caffe work.  I would then suggest installing TensorFlow in a virtualenv, so that you don't have to worry about having incompatible copies of protobuf in your system libraries.
body: I would suggest uninstalling protobuf and installing the protobuf version you want to make Caffe work.  I would then suggest installing TensorFlow in a virtualenv, so that you don't have to worry about having incompatible copies of protobuf in your system libraries.
